text:

Yeah, but that what they signed up for

text: Amazing to hear people on *MSNBC* saying Mueller report might not be a big deal

text: *If* the Mueller report is a fizzle—we obviously have to wait—the story will be that no one was ever particularly invested in it, that no expected gigantic Russia revelations just over the horizon, that it wasn’t the subject of non-stop media obsession
author: RichLowry

text: The late, great publisher of NR Bill Rusher had an axiom: “Politicians always let you down.” It’s one of the great truths of public life, but two exceptions are Mike Lee and Pat Toomey, who are consistently constructive, thoughtful and principled. They are a credit to the Senate
author: RichLowry
